Package com.kiancross.mandelbrot

Class ImageConfigurationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kiancross.mandelbrot.ImageConfigurationManager
  • public class ImageConfigurationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to manage image configurations - allows new configurations to be added and stores the history so that actions can be undone/redone.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ImageConfigurationManager​(ImageConfiguration initialConfiguration)
      Construct a configuration manager.

      • addConfiguration

        public boolean addConfiguration​(ImageConfiguration newConfiguration)
        Add a new configuration. If the configuration has not changed it will not be added to the undo stack.
        Parameters:
        newConfiguration - The new configuration to add.
        Returns:
        Boolean value indicating if the configuration was added to the undo stack.
